data.title: Legal Notice
data.text:
Website information

Welcome to the RATP Dev Australia website and the social media accessible therein (herein after referred to as the “Site”). By using this Site, you acknowledge having read this legal notice and you agree to respect and be bound by it. This legal notice is intended to inform you of the existence of intellectual property rights to be respected and other terms governing your use or access of the Site. The content of this notice may change without prior notice; we therefore invite you to consult it regularly. Your continued use or access to this Site will constitute an acceptance of this legal notice, as changed.

Production and development

Atixnet (SAS), headquartered at 2bis Avenue Foch, 94160 SAINT MANDE, registered in the R.C.S. of Créteil under the unique identification number 443 452 503 - NAF code 6202A and represented by Mr Guillaume TOTOT, as Manager.

Publication Director: Ms. Laurence Batlle (CEO).

Hosting: the Site is hosted by RATP DEV AUSTRALIA PTY LTD ABN 74 639 090 994 (herein after referred to as the “Company”).

Purpose of the Site

The Site provides information on the Company. The information on this Site (including announcements therein) is made available for general information purposes only and does not bind the Company or any of its affiliates in any way or constitute advice (including financial, investment or legal advice). Any forward-looking statements contained on this Site reflect the Company’s then-current views with respect to future events and have been made upon the Company’s assumptions as to future matters which are uncertain and subject to change. The Company and each of its affiliates accepts no responsibility for any liability arising from your use or reliance on the information contained on this Site.

Any communication may be sent to the following address: contact.australia@ratpdev.com

Protected rights – Intellectual property

The elements on, or otherwise constituting, this Site, developed by or on behalf of the Company or its affiliate (hereinafter referred to as the "Content") and may be protected by the applicable legislation concerning copyright and trademark law.

The Content includes, in particular, the architecture, the graphic charter (including the colours, the fonts and the graphic organization of the screens), as well as all the information and elements available on the internet Site, including the texts, articles, photographs, illustrations, images, brands and logos, data, databases and all sound elements (such as voice, music or sound effects) and fixed or animated visuals (such as graphic animations or audio-visual sequences), specific software developments, downloadable programs.

The Content is the property of the Company or its licensees (e.g. technical service providers). Any material you transmit to the Company via this Site may be used by the Company, its affiliates, successors in title and licensees (including customers) and you waive (or if you are not a natural person, you agree to procure a consent to) any of their act or omission that may otherwise infringe any moral rights that may exist in the material.

Any use, reproduction, representation, distribution and/or exploitation of all or part of the Content, by any means, in any form and for any purpose whatsoever, is prohibited without the express prior written consent of the Company. In any case, and subject to the foregoing, the source (this Site and the Company) and, if applicable, the name of the author, must be clearly indicated.

Anyone who does not comply with the applicable legal provisions may be liable to the penal sanctions provided for by law, notwithstanding any other legal action taken by the Company.

Photo credits

Audiovisual Agency RATP

54, quai de la Rapée

75599 PARIS CEDEX 12

(Gilles Aligon, Charles Ardaillon, Jean-Marie Carrier, Bertrand Chabrol, Noam Cilirie, Gérard Dumax, Didier Dupuy, Gilbert Gaillard, Didier Jackson, Bruno Marguerite, Jean-François Mauboussin, René Minoli, René Roy, Denis Sutton, Joël Thibault, Eric Touzé).

Liability

The Company excludes all warranties of any kind with respect to or in connection with the Content, Site or this legal notice, including any warranty of fitness for a particular purpose, ownership, non-infringement and as to the accuracy or completeness of the information contained on or available through this Site, to the full extent permitted by law. If any warranty or guarantee cannot be excluded at law, then to the extent permitted by law the liability of the Company or each of its affiliates in relation to such warranty is limited to the resupply of the content or the payment of the cost of having the content resupplied. In addition, to the extent permitted by law, the Company and its affiliates disclaim any liability whatsoever, whether in contract, tort (including negligence) or any other basis in law or equity, for direct or indirect damages, incidental or consequential damages, loss of data, business, reputation, anticipated savings, profit or loss that does not arise naturally (i.e. not in the usual course of things) from a breach or other event giving rise to liability in connection with the Content, Site or legal notice, whether or not resulting from or related to the use or operation of this Site and the Content. To the extent the foregoing limitation of liability is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be void, the aggregate liability of the Company or each of its affiliates for all claims and losses, whether in contract, tort (including negligence) or any other basis in law or equity, arising out of or in connection with the Content, Site or this legal notice is limited to $10.

In addition, the Site may contain inaccuracies or typographical errors. Changes and updates are regularly made to this Site. In this respect, the Company reserves the right to make any modification, rectification or change at any time.

This Site contains links allowing you to leave the Site. These links are provided for your convenience only, and do not imply endorsement or endorsement of such sites by the Company. The target sites are not under the control of the Company, and they are in no way responsible for the content of these sites, the links they contain, the products or services they offer, or the changes or updates made to them.

Trademarks, product names or services, domain names and corporate names mentioned on this Site remain the property of their respective owners.

The mention of links or trademarks, names, services, domain names and names of other companies does not imply the existence of any association between the Company and these companies, products or services, brands, names or denominations in question.

Protection of privacy – Collection and use of personal data

The use of the Site requires the collection and processing of personal data about you.

For more information, we invite you to read the Privacy Policy available on the Site.

Applicable law and jurisdiction

The site and its contents are governed by the laws of New South Wales, Australia, and any dispute relating to it will be subjected to the jurisdiction of New South Wales, Australia.
